_EFI_SEC_PLATFORM_INFORMATION_PPI Struct Reference


Data Fields

EFI_SEC_PLATFORM_INFORMATION PlatformInformation

Detailed Description

This service abstracts platform-specific information. It is necessary to convey this information to the PEI Foundation so that it can discover where to begin dispatching PEIMs.

Field Documentation
